title: running league on ubuntu
body: I'm having trouble making league of legends working. although i successfully download it, and it said to launch, so i press it and somehow nothing will pop out. is their someway to fix it?

replies.body: We don't offer support for Linux, so I wouldn't be able to offer any wisdom here.  :/  Generally, this issue can be caused by permissions/security settings with other OS like Windows.  My recommendation would be to check out support sites or forums for your OS specifically to troubleshoot.  Hope you find what you're looking for!
